scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.install:service: node -e "const { spawnSync } = require('child_process'); const isWin = process.platform === 'win32'; const shell = isWin ? 'powershell' : 'sh'; const script = isWin ? './scripts/install.ps1' : './scripts/install.sh'; const result = spawnSync(shell, [script], { stdio: 'inherit' }); process.exit(result.status ?? 0);"
scripts.uninstall:service: node -e "const { spawnSync } = require('child_process'); const isWin = process.platform === 'win32'; const shell = isWin ? 'powershell' : 'sh'; const script = isWin ? './scripts/uninstall.ps1' : './scripts/uninstall.sh'; const result = spawnSync(shell, [script], { stdio: 'inherit' }); process.exit(result.status ?? 0);"
scripts.service: node -e "const { spawnSync } = require('child_process'); const isWin = process.platform === 'win32'; const shell = isWin ? 'powershell' : 'sh'; const script = isWin ? './scripts/service.ps1' : './scripts/service.sh'; const args = process.argv.slice(2); const result = spawnSync(shell, [script, ...args], { stdio: 'inherit' }); process.exit(result.status ?? 0);"
